/.title: Sledge - One Shopify App. Works on various stacks.
/.description: Build instant search, product filters, wishlist, product review, etc. for your store using your preferred tech stacks — in just a few minutes.

/apps/review.title: Product Review
/apps/review.description: Show the best review of your products with the easy and customizable product review widgets to gain customer trust and boost your store sales.

/apps/wishlist.title: Wishlist
/apps/wishlist.description: Increase engagement and sales on your stores by allowing customers to save their desired products for later.

/apps/instant-search.title: Instant Search
/apps/instant-search.description: Personalized and customized instant search widgets that fit with the look and feel of your brand.

/apps/product-filters.title: Product Filters
/apps/product-filters.description: Instantly integrate a smart product filters on any pages including collections and search result pages.

/apps/upcoming.title: Upcoming Apps
/apps/upcoming.description: Instant Search, product filters, wishlist, product review, what else? Sledge will keep adding new features, see what we're cooking below.

/tech-stacks/hydrogen.title: Hydrogen Integration
/tech-stacks/hydrogen.description: Build instant search, product filters, wishlist, product review, etc. for your store using Hydrogen — in just a few minutes.

/tech-stacks/next.title: Next Integration
/tech-stacks/next.description: Build instant search, product filters, wishlist, product review, etc. for your store using Next.js Commerce — in just a few minutes.

/tech-stacks/shopify.title: Liquid Integration
/tech-stacks/shopify.description: Build instant search, product filters, wishlist, product review, etc. for your store using Shopify Liquid — in just a few minutes.

/tech-stacks/webflow.title: Webflow Integration
/tech-stacks/webflow.description: Build instant search, product filters, wishlist, product review, etc. for your store using Webflow — in just a few minutes.
